title: Leading cigarette brands in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2016 , by sales value
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales value in million GBP for 10 number of Months.
The Sales value in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Month Sterling and lowest at Month Windsor.
There is a difference of 1049.4 between the maximum Month Sterling and minimum Month Windsor.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Sales value in million GBP in the y axis.
The maximum Sales value in million GBP 1511.3 is found at Month Sterling and the minimum is found at Windsor where Month is 461.9.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales value in million GBP for 10 number of Months.
The Sales value in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Month Sterling and lowest at Month Windsor.
There is a difference of 1049.4 between the maximum Month Sterling and minimum Month Windsor.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Sales value in million GBP for 10 number of Months.
The Sales value in million GBP is appeared to be the highest at Month Sterling and lowest at Month Windsor.
The second highest Sales value in million GBP is appeared to be the Month Mayfair.
The difference of Sales value in million GBP between the highest and lowest Month is 1049.4.
The Month Sterling has the highest Sales value in million GBP, followed by Mayfair, and Lambert and Butler. Down to the Month Windsor which is the lowest.
Overall Sales value in million GBP has decreased over the Months.
The Month Windsor has 1.95 times less Sales value in million GBP than average.
The Sales value in million GBP is 7753.7 if we add up values of all Months.
